column4: um, somehow i doubt this problem is related to ubuntu, but my windows-using friends can get this to work fine so..
can anyone here using firefox get the search box to accept input? http://armory.wow-europe.com/
yes
just me then.. argh.
you can't type in the search box in firefox?  on a webpage or in the program
it's not everywhere, just on that particular site, it's a Flash search bar
though it works in windows, i don't think its anything proprietary
ooh.  I thought you meant the search bar built into ff
hehe, that works fine
yea, I cant type in that either.  it may be broken flash
thanks for checking
the dropdown is broken too....all overlapping and such
np
yeah, the site itself is rather broken
do you run WOW in wine?
yes
i figured out a workaround now, if you choose 'browse the armory' and select a search, a normal non-flash input box loads
cool.  does WOW work well in wine?
there is a performance hit, but it's otherwise perfect, apart from i can't get AA to work (it worked fine before a reinstall, user error)
hmm.  never thought they would get it to work.  cool.
